About me

Hello, I'm S.M. Jubayer, better known as Sadat Jubyaer. I was born in Kishoreganj district of Bangladesh. From childhood, I was interested in Technology and Computing. I have learned basic programming web designing, graphic designing, have done some video editing works. I'm still learning new things daily. I don't only see dreams, also try my best to fulfill my dreams. I believe on works, not words.

Currently, I'm studing Computer Science and Engineering at American International University- Bangladesh (AIUB)
